local

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • local.Transaction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransCancelOfferingFiles, TransEnlightSlowNodeDownloader, TransEnlightSlowNodeFinished, TransEnlightSlowNodeMasterCommand, TransEnlightSlowNodeUploader, TransFileResultNotify, TransObtainedFileMaster, TransObtainedFileSlave, TransQueueManipulateSlave, TransQuitSlave, TransReturnResult, TransStartSlaves, TransTransferSharedFiles

    public abstract class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that represents some action that needs to be executed, process response, and provides futher actions by update method that can be called in cycle.
    Author:
    Ivan Straka
